templates.title: InvokeAI (GPU Optimized)
templates.name: invokeai
templates.description: Local AI image generation with NVIDIA GPU acceleration (requires Docker Desktop GPU support).
templates.note: Ensure Docker Desktop GPU support is enabled and NVIDIA drivers are installed on the host.

templates.title: ComfyUI (GPU)
templates.name: comfyui
templates.description: Node-based Stable Diffusion workflow UI with GPU acceleration.
templates.note: Bind a models directory if you want to re-use weights.

templates.title: Automatic1111 Stable Diffusion WebUI (GPU)
templates.name: automatic1111
templates.description: Stable Diffusion WebUI with GPU support.
templates.note: Consider xformers or other runtime args for performance; training is VRAM intensive.

templates.title: Ollama (GPU LLM Runtime)
templates.name: ollama
templates.description: Local LLM runtime with GPU acceleration for models like Llama and Mistral.
templates.note: Use ollama CLI or compatible UIs to interact with models.

templates.title: text-generation-webui (GPU)
templates.name: text-generation-webui
templates.description: Web UI for running and experimenting with text-generation models on GPU.
templates.note: Ideal for managing multiple GGUF or HF models behind a graphical interface.

templates.title: Whisper (GPU Speech-to-Text)
templates.name: whisper
templates.description: GPU-accelerated Whisper for transcription and translation.
templates.note: Mount an audio directory to /audio for batch jobs.

templates.title: Kohya SS (GPU LoRA Trainer)
templates.name: kohya_ss
templates.description: GPU-accelerated training UI for LoRA and fine-tuning Stable Diffusion models.
templates.note: Training is VRAM-intensive; best suited for high-memory GPUs like 3090 Ti.

templates.title: Darktable (GUI Photo Editor)
templates.name: darktable
templates.description: Darktable running in a container with GUI access (RDP / web gateway). Map your photo folders and config for persistent storage.
templates.note: Adjust PUID, PGID, TZ and volume names to match your host. Do not expose RDP to the public internet without a VPN or reverse proxy.
